title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message:
i have a 820-3115 that displays a blue image on LCD, any idea of what the problem can be?

thank you guys in advance!

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message: Just so others with more expertise can help you, are you saying that the screen is just a blank blue screen or that you gat the normal image, but in just a blue colour?

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message: It is a solid blue screen,

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message:
So there is no image at all, just a blue screen, like in some LCD test?
In this case, first step is to try a known good assembly LCD + video cable.

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message: I have already tested a known working LCD and i just got the blue screen, solid blue

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message: Any history?? Water damage or something else???

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message:
Check for knocked off components on DATA lines of J9000.
Also check resistance to ground on all these lines...

title: 820-3115 - Blue image
message: Diode measuring on all LVDS data line pins on the LCD connector
